author: By JONATHAN MATTISE and ADRIAN SAINZ Associated Press
title: Tennessee cities, counties broaden closures amid coronavirus
description: NASHVILLE, Tenn. (AP) — More cities and counties in Tennessee on Monday issued strict orders for nonessential businesses to shut down temporarily and people to stay at home as much as possible to curb the spread of the coronavirus.
content:
NASHVILLE, Tenn. (AP) More cities and counties in Tennessee on Monday issued strict orders for nonessential businesses to shut down temporarily and people to stay at home as much as possible to curb the spread of the coronavirus.
